name: @electron-builder/monorepo

scripts.//: do not wrap into single quotes - windows doesn't unwrap arg in this case
scripts.///: Please see https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#run-test-using-cli how to run particular test instead full (and very slow) run
scripts.test-all: pnpm compile && pnpm pretest && pnpm ci:test
scripts.test-linux: docker run --rm -e CI=${CI:-true} -e DEBUG=${DEBUG:-} -e UPDATE_SNAPSHOT=${UPDATE_SNAPSHOT:-false} -e TEST_FILES="${TEST_FILES:-HoistedNodeModuleTest}" -v $(pwd):/project -v $(pwd)-node-modules:/project/node_modules -v $HOME/Library/Caches/electron:/root/.cache/electron -v $HOME/Library/Caches/electron-builder:/root/.cache/electron-builder ${TEST_RUNNER_IMAGE_TAG:-electronuserland/builder:22-wine-mono} /bin/bash -c "pnpm install && pnpm test-all"
scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.ci:version: pnpm i && pnpm changelog && changeset version && node scripts/update-package-version-export.js && pnpm compile && pnpm generate-all && git add .
scripts.ci:publish: pnpm i && pnpm compile && pnpm publish -r --tag next && changeset tag
scripts.docs:all: pnpm docs:prebuild && pnpm docs:build && pnpm docs:mkdocs

//: repository must be specified otherwise conventional-changelog will use forked repo (currently cloned)
////: All typings are added into root `package.json` to avoid duplication errors in the IDE compiler (several `node.d.ts` files).
